Containers.Name: Checkmk 2.2.0
Containers.Description:
Monitors local services and reports any issues to the Checkmk server. Please cosider using the version 2.4.0 of this plugin for new installations. EOL for this version is 23.11.2025.
For monitoring docker deamon and SMART, follow the instructions in the README file. https://github.com/Donimax/unraid-check-mk-agent?tab=readme-ov-file#checkmk-docker-and-smart-plugin
